name: Duke Nukem: One Minute to Kick Ass (itch)
name_original: Duke Nukem: One Minute to Kick Ass (itch)
description:
Created For the Micro Fangame Jam 2019.
Dr. Proton is Threatening to Blow up the World.
You have to Kick his Ass and get back in time before your Girl leaves.
Welcome to Duke Nukem: One Minute to Kick Ass.
This Game is Procedurally Generated and you can Set the Random seed on the Title screen to replay a level or for speed runs.
Controls:
Arrow Keys: movement
Space Bar: Jump
Alt Key: Shoot Gun
